byline.contributor: Francois Essomba reported from Bamenda, Cameroon, and Dionne Searcey from Dakar, Senegal.
byline.original: By FRANCOIS ESSOMBA and DIONNE SEARCEY

lead_paragraph: Demonstrations against the government, which is dominated by French speakers, have led to arrests and at times to violence.
snippet: Demonstrations against the government, which is dominated by French speakers, have led to arrests and at times to violence....

headline.main: A Bilingual Cameroon Teeters After English Speakers Protest Treatment
headline.print_headline: Bilingual Cameroon Teeters as English Speakers Protest Treatment
